title: [Pixel 3XL] Is there a bug or are the speakers just bad?
content:
It's like it's mono and muffled.
It's mostly noticeable in videos. 

Am I the only one? 
What he done about this? 
Do I have to replace it? 

I really can't stand this issue. 
I already have bad hearing and having this problem as well drives me near insane.
